name: reference-capture-form-field-plugin
description: This is a reference implementation of a **DHIS2 Capture Form Field Plugin** from within the DHIS2 Capture App. This is an example which should be used for reference, it **SHOULD NOT** be used directly in production.

scripts.build: cd capture-plugin && yarn install --frozen-lockfile && yarn build --no-verify
scripts.deploy-plugin: cd capture-plugin && yarn deploy http://localhost:8080 --username admin --password district
